mapper.sql: role_id, menu_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, delete_flag
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_role_menu( role_id, menu_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, delete_flag )VALUES
( #{element.roleId}, #{element.menuId}, #{element.createBy}, #{element.createTime}, #{element.updateBy}, #{element.updateTime}, #{element.deleteFlag} )
